backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with user profiles, goals, run logs, achievements, motivation data, and access‑controlled query methods plus comparison helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of all frontend files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, light/dark themes, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the app root and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, theme provider, and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/achievements/Ach: Renders achievement cards showing earned and locked badges using catalog data.
Sign‑in/sign‑out button handling Internet Identity login flow and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/GuestModeBa: Banner informing users they are in guest mode with a sign‑in prompt.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog that collects an optional display name and saves it via a mutation with loading and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout providing header, footer, social links, attribution, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/motivation/Celeb: Alert banner that displays newly unlocked achievements with a trophy icon.
frontend/src/components/motivation/Motiv: Card showing a motivation message, goal progress, and loading skeletons when needed.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Mobile bottom navigation bar with route-aware icons for Home, Log Run, History, and Settings.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Remind: Banner reminding users to log a run based on reminder preferences and time, with quick navigation to the log page.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorCall: Destructive alert for showing errors with an optional retry button.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAchievemen: React Query hook fetching achievements from the actor when available.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useDashboardS: Aggregates goals, logs, motivation, and achievements into a dashboard summary with new-achievement detection.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useGoals.ts: Hooks for fetching goals and saving the daily goal with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useRunLogs.ts: Hooks for fetching run logs and adding a log while invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state, identity loading, and login helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrincipal.ts: Returns the current principal string or 'guest' if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and save the caller's user profile via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/achievementsCatalog.ts: Exports a static catalog of achievement definitions with IDs, names, and descriptions.
frontend/src/lib/preferences.ts: Manages reading and writing reminder preferences per principal using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/streak.ts: Computes streak metrics, today's completion, and formats distances for display.
frontend/src/lib/submitGuards.ts: Prevents duplicate form submissions within a short time window using a hash check.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validates run log inputs, ensuring positive duration and reasonable distance values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the dashboard with profile status, streaks, achievements, and banners using multiple data hooks.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays a list of recent run logs with loading, empty, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LogRunPage.tsx: Form page for logging a run with validation, duplicate submit prevention, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/RunLogDetailPage.tsx: Displays a detailed view of a specific run log with date, duration, optional distance, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides UI for managing daily goals and reminder preferences, including saving goals and persisting reminder settings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app goals, features, requirements, and image assets needed.
